text:
The best thing to do here in Marrakech
is to do a 4x4 tour

all around here
looking forward to it

This is the Breber hammam
Some people make it with cement

or just with the ground like this
oh I see

and so they make the fire here
fire to be hot

and this is the water from shower
can go out

come and see inside
it’s hot now because

they want to take a shower
after I think 30 or 40 minutes

the water is very hot
and will give off steam

that is amazing
Yes and this will also be hot

and when the close with the plastic
it will be very hot

very hot and have a bath
in 30 or 40 minutes they take the hammam

so this is the traditional hammam for sure
we get our little ones in town
but this is the real thing the real deal

Ok we are about to enter a typical Berber
house

and when you’re in Marrakech you bring a
gift with you for the host

so I got some dates at the market
that I’m going to bring in
it is tradition

When you’re invited into a home
in Morocco
it’s very important to take off your shoes

and this is our hostess for the day
and so I just wanted to give
pour vous
Merci Merci

very important to wash your hands
before you have any tea

and this is they way it’s done
with a basin

and after you look at the camera
OK

there’s so many things to think about
this is the way to pour the tea

I did it
very nice
woo hoo

Thank you so much
that was an amazing day

you’re such an incredible guide
No problem

we saw so many things
we got to boot around on these

amazing ATVs
thank you

you’re an incredible guide
thank you very much
